title: Who Is Sheinelle Jones’ Husband? Uche Ojeh’s Job & Relationship History
description: Sheinelle Jones and her husband share a heartwarming bond, leaving fans curious about their relationship history. The popular news anchor and journalist is best known for being a correspondent for NBC News. She recently made the news after temporarily stepping down from her role as a host on NBC’s Today show due to a “family […] The post Who Is Sheinelle Jones’ Husband? Uche Ojeh’s Job & Relationship History appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Namrata Ghosh
excerpt: Curious about Sheinelle Jones' husband? Here's everything about the NBC anchor's spouse, including his work and their relationship history.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Sheinelle Jones and her husband share a heartwarming bond, leaving fans curious about their relationship history. The popular news anchor and journalist is best known for being a correspondent for NBC News. She recently made the news after temporarily stepping down from her role as a host on NBC’s Today show due to a “family health matter.” So, here’s everything we know about Jones’ spouse, how they met, and more details about the couple. Who is Sheinelle Jones married to? Sheinelle Jones is married to Uche Ojeh. Ojeh is Nigerian and encourages his children to embrace their culture and traditions. In addition to his work, he enjoys athletic pursuits. Ojeh even completed a triathlon in October 2023, a victory his wife proudly commemorated via an Instagram post. Dedicating a congratulatory message to her husband and son, Jones wrote, “I think it’s so important to celebrate the wins of the people you love— this weekend it was all about ‘The Uche’s.’” She continued, “My youngest son’s soccer team took first in their tournament… meanwhile, dad, AKA , big Uche – conquered a triathlon. It’s something he’s always wanted to do.” What is Uche Ojeh’s job? Sheinelle Jones’ husband is a consultant by profession. As per Uche Ojeh’s official LinkedIn profile, he graduated college in 2001 from Northwestern University in Evanston, Illinois. He holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science with an economic concentration. Ojeh currently works as a managing partner for UAO Consulting, a position he has held for over 17 years. He has previously worked as a consultant for prestigious firms like Accenture and IBM. Sheinelle Jones and Uche Ojeh’s relationship history Sheinelle Jones and her husband, Uche Ojeh, first met in the late 90s at Northwestern University. In an exclusive interview with the University’s magazine, Jones shared that she was a freshman at the time, while Ojeh was a high school senior just visiting the campus. As per Today, the pair was in a long-distance relationship for eight years before Ucheh proposed to Jones on their university campus. Jones and Ojeh finally tied the knot on September 2, 2007, in Philadelphia, where she grew up. They welcomed their oldest son, Kayin, in August 2009. Three years later, Jones gave birth to their fraternal twins, Clara and Uche, in July 2012. Sheinelle Jones and Uche Ojeh have almost completed 18 years of marriage and are going strong as of writing. In February 2023, the veteran anchor even shared a loving Instagram post for her husband’s birthday, cherishing their moments together over the years.
html:
Sheinelle Jones and her husband share a heartwarming bond, leaving fans curious about their relationship history. The popular news anchor and journalist is best known for being a correspondent for NBC News. She recently made the news after temporarily stepping down from her role as a host on NBC’s Today show due to a “family health matter.”

So, here’s everything we know about Jones’ spouse, how they met, and more details about the couple.

Who is Sheinelle Jones married to?

Sheinelle Jones is married to Uche Ojeh.

Ojeh is Nigerian and encourages his children to embrace their culture and traditions. In addition to his work, he enjoys athletic pursuits. Ojeh even completed a triathlon in October 2023, a victory his wife proudly commemorated via an Instagram post.

Dedicating a congratulatory message to her husband and son, Jones wrote, “I think it’s so important to celebrate the wins of the people you love— this weekend it was all about ‘The Uche’s.’” She continued, “My youngest son’s soccer team took first in their tournament… meanwhile, dad, AKA , big Uche – conquered a triathlon. It’s something he’s always wanted to do.”

What is Uche Ojeh’s job?

Sheinelle Jones’ husband is a consultant by profession.

As per Uche Ojeh’s official LinkedIn profile, he graduated college in 2001 from Northwestern University in Evanston, Illinois. He holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science with an economic concentration.

Ojeh currently works as a managing partner for UAO Consulting, a position he has held for over 17 years. He has previously worked as a consultant for prestigious firms like Accenture and IBM.

Sheinelle Jones and Uche Ojeh’s relationship history

Sheinelle Jones and her husband, Uche Ojeh, first met in the late 90s at Northwestern University.

In an exclusive interview with the University’s magazine, Jones shared that she was a freshman at the time, while Ojeh was a high school senior just visiting the campus. As per Today, the pair was in a long-distance relationship for eight years before Ucheh proposed to Jones on their university campus.

Jones and Ojeh finally tied the knot on September 2, 2007, in Philadelphia, where she grew up. They welcomed their oldest son, Kayin, in August 2009. Three years later, Jones gave birth to their fraternal twins, Clara and Uche, in July 2012.

Sheinelle Jones and Uche Ojeh have almost completed 18 years of marriage and are going strong as of writing. In February 2023, the veteran anchor even shared a loving Instagram post for her husband’s birthday, cherishing their moments together over the years.
